metadata.title: CVE-2014-6311 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: generate_doygen.pl in ace before 6.2.7+dfsg-2 creates predictable file names in the /tmp directory which allows attackers to gain elevated privileges.

notes.note: jdstrand> per Debian, not installed into the binary packages

criterions.comment: ace package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
